      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="ca">Es pot conduir sense risc?</string>
            <string language="en">Is it possible to drive with no risk?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ist anzutreiben möglich, ohne Gefahr?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Est-il possible de piloter sans le risque ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É possível dirigir com nenhum risco?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È possibile da guidare senza il rischio?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι δυνατό να οδηγήσει χωρίς τον κίνδυνο;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) que explica el risc que comporta conduir un vehicle després d'haver consumit begudes alcohòliques.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) explaining the risks of driving after drinking alcohol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">alcoholisme</string>
            <string language="en">alcoholism</string>
            <string language="es">alcoholismo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació per a la salut</string>
            <string language="en">health education</string>
            <string language="es">educación para la salud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">prevenció</string>
            <string language="en">prevention</string>
            <string language="es">prevención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació vial</string>
            <string language="en">road safety education</string>
            <string language="es">educación vial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">seguretat vial</string>
            <string language="en">traffic safety</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und beantworten Sie (das DURCHSCHNITTLICHE) 
Erklären der Gefahren des Antreibens, nachdem Sie Spiritus getrunken 
haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remettez en cause et répondez à expliquer (PAR) les 
risques de piloter après le boire de l'alcool.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda a explicar (PAR) os riscos de dirigir
após ter bebido o álcool.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a spiegare (PAR) i rischi di 
azionamento dopo avere bevuto l'alcool.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) που εξηγούν τους κινδύνους 
μετά από να πιει το οινόπνευμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alkoholismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
